manufacturing_subindustry.helper: This helps us understand your specific needs.

manufacturing_intro_nlp.prompt: Tell us about your manufacturing business
manufacturing_intro_nlp.subtitle: What do you make? Where are you located? What's your capacity?
manufacturing_intro_nlp.helper: Describe your business in a few sentences. We'll help you expand this with relevant details.
manufacturing_intro_nlp.placeholder: We manufacture denim garments in Istanbul...

manufacturing_products.prompt: What product categories do you manufacture?
manufacturing_products.helper: List the main types of products you make. You can add more later.

manufacturing_production_model.helper: How do you handle orders and inventory?

manufacturing_capacity.helper: Approximate number of units you can produce per month.

manufacturing_shifts.prompt: How many shifts do you run per day?

manufacturing_seasonality.prompt: Do you have seasonal demand patterns?
manufacturing_seasonality.helper: Some businesses experience higher demand during certain months.

fashion_garment_types.prompt: What types of garments do you produce?
fashion_garment_types.helper: List the specific garment categories you manufacture.

fashion_variants.prompt: Do you produce multiple sizes and colors?
fashion_variants.helper: We'll help you set up size ranges and color variants.

fashion_seasonal.prompt: Do you work with seasonal collections?

manufacturing_items_complexity.prompt: Do your products have components or sub-parts?
manufacturing_items_complexity.helper: For example, a garment might have fabric, zippers, buttons, and thread as components.

manufacturing_tracking_level.helper: Choose the level of granularity for your tracking.

options.label: Per unit
options.description: Each item has a unique ID (serial number)

options.label: Per batch
options.description: Groups of items tracked together (lot numbers)

options.label: Per order
options.description: Track by order only (no individual IDs)

manufacturing_teams_nlp.helper: Tell us about your departments, roles, and how your team is organized.
manufacturing_teams_nlp.placeholder: We have a production team, quality team, warehouse team, and admin...

manufacturing_floor_app.prompt: Will floor workers scan items and update status?
manufacturing_floor_app.helper: Enable the mobile Floor App for workers to track items in real-time.

manufacturing_sites_mapping.prompt: Do you want to map your facility layout?
manufacturing_sites_mapping.helper: Floor plans help visualize where work happens and track items by location.

manufacturing_sites_builder.helper: Click zones to designate areas: Production, QA, Storage, Shipping, Office.

manufacturing_analytics_audience.helper: Select all that apply. We'll customize views for each audience.

manufacturing_metrics.prompt: What metrics matter most to you?
manufacturing_metrics.helper: List the KPIs you track or want to track.
manufacturing_metrics.placeholder: e.g., On-time delivery, Defect rate, Throughput

manufacturing_chart_preference.prompt: What type of charts do you prefer?

options.label: Trend charts
options.description: Line and area charts for tracking over time

options.label: Comparison charts
options.description: Bar and column charts for comparing values
